title: Gravity Globe
summaries: The Gravity Globe is an Expert Mode Accessory found in the Moon Lord's Treasure Bag. When worn, it allows the holder to flip gravity, so that the player falls up instead of down, and toggle gravity back to normal afterward. Once equipped, pressing the â–² Up key toggles the gravity direction. This only affects the player with the item equipped.
